modern_home_description: Experience a modern home with state-of-the-art features, locally crafted and fully controllable from your smartphone.
mission_statement: To empower Bangladeshi homes and businesses with sustainable, affordable, and locally-tailored smart automation solutions using recycled materials, modular designs, and Bangla-friendly interfaces.
about_bytebots: Bytebots was established by a team of proficient engineering students from the Departments of Electronics & Telecommunication Engineering and Chemical Engineering at Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology (RUET). Leveraging their academic expertise in embedded systems, sustainable design, and materials engineering, the founders aimed to address the pressing needs of Bangladeshi households and institutions. Their interdisciplinary strengths and commitment to innovation led to the development of affordable, eco-friendly, and locally adapted smart automation solutions.

welcome_title: ByteBot - Master Your Home's Smart Devices
feature_1_desc: Your privacy is our priority. With end-to-end encryption, your home and data are always protected.
feature_2_desc: Monitor and manage your power usage to save on bills and reduce your carbon footprint effortlessly.
feature_3_desc: Create custom scenes and schedules that adapt to your lifestyle, making your home work for you.
product_description: Discover our range of smart devices designed to make your life easier and more efficient.
product_1_desc: Control your lights and appliances from anywhere. Automate schedules and save energy with our intuitive smart switch.
product_2_desc: Keep your home spotless with our automated smart cleaner. Schedule cleanings and control it remotely via the app.
how_it_works_subtitle: Control your devices with ease using our intuitive mobile app. Stay connected to your home, wherever you are. Get real-time updates and manage everything with a single tap.
how_it_works_step1_desc: Easily set up your ByteBot devices and connect them to your home Wi-Fi.
how_it_works_step2_desc: Name your devices, group them by room, and set custom schedules or scenes.
how_it_works_step3_desc: Enjoy full control over your home from anywhere in the world through the ByteBot app.
testimonials_subtitle: Hear from happy ByteBot users who have transformed their homes.
testimonial_1_text: "ByteBot has completely changed how I interact with my home. The smart switch is incredibly convenient, and the app is so easy to use. Highly recommended!"
testimonial_2_text: "The energy monitoring feature is a game-changer. I've already seen a noticeable drop in my electricity bill. It's smart, efficient, and eco-friendly."
testimonial_3_text: "I was impressed by the build quality and the focus on using recycled materials. It feels good to support a local company that is also environmentally conscious."
review_form_subtitle: We'd love to hear your feedback! Let us know how ByteBot is working for you.
